name: Whaleshares v2 brown theme
description: This is a brown style for the Whaleshares website. It is not perfect but it is a far better option for me than the original theme for v2. The template for this style is made by stormi under ( CC BY-NC-SA - Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike) , while my version is free and modified to fit Whaleshares website.

user.name: aschatria
user.about: Networker, hobby programmer, fiction writer, humorist, poet

additional_info:
The thing that made me create this style sheet was an extremely aggressive white color of the default website. 
This theme features earth like colors, mostly brown, chocolate and coffee mild thones. 
The font and comment section is made to give you a better overview of the content. 
Font is larger, so are the Follow/Mute button. 
Comments are neatly separated in boxes.
Editor is dark black so that the typing errors are more visible. 

The style is not perfect, for example some icons are blurry. 
Other glitches can include a main website feed to suddenly go invisible. No idea what is a cause of this, but in my experience if you disable the style, refresh a page and then re-enable it, everything works again fine. 
It can be a fault in my browser, but if that happens to yours, just do that and a style will go back as it was. 

The biggest difference is a profile page, I removed the cover image. Why? It takes too much place and I personally hate to scroll down. 

Because this is a simply a collection of custom colors and shapes, the same glitches that affect a page without an additional style with happen on this one as well. 

"Page not found! Oops! Looks like you followed a bad link." - this is the most frequent error that I am getting these days, so I have to refresh a page. This has noting with a style. It is just the way it is without it.
